question:
[Oliver]'s brother, [Brian], recently made it into town. [Kent] invited his sister [Kecia] over for dinner. She asked if [Oliver] would be there, since [Kent] is his father. [Kent] told her that [Oliver] would be there and would also bring his brother, [Brian]. [Rick] and his brother [Oliver] went to the park to play basketball. [Davis] and his brother, [Rick] run a turtle farm.
Question: How is [Kecia] related to [Davis]?
